sentences: Co-Chair S. N. Sok Appadu introduced the Co-Chairs proposals for draft conclusions and a draft decision on a work programme on Article 6.
PERU, opposed by BRAZIL, suggested linking activities under Article 6 on climate change with similar activities on local pollution problems.
CANADA argued for postponing debate on the proposed draft decision until SB-17 to give Parties sufficient time to assess its potential implications.
A representative of the GEF urged careful consideration of language regarding financial resources.
Consultations continued late into the night.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
